name: mongodb-admin
description: A Web user interface to administer MongoDB databases built using Express.
preInstallNotes:
This DC/OS Service is currently EXPERIMENTAL. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.

```Advanced Installation options notes```

networking / *external_access*: create an entry in Marathon-LB for accessing the service from outside of the cluster

networking / *external_access_port*: port to be used in Marathon-LB for accessing the service.
postInstallNotes:
Service installed.

To avoid issues with the web interface it is strongly recommended to access this service through the endpoint created in Marathon-LB.

Default login: `admin`/`password`.

Default DC/OS MongoDB connection string (copy-paste into *add connection* box): `mongodb://mongodb.marathon.l4lb.thisdcos.directory:27017`
